reviewtext: When it works, it works flawlessly.  When it doesn't... well, let's say it isn't very pretty.  Rebooting with the card reader plugged into the USB port on a Win2000 box will consistently lead to a Blue Screen of death.  Reader has to be plugged in AFTER Windows boots which is a drag.  Not bad overall, but there has to be better out there.
summary: Beware the Blue Screen of Death
